mapper.update:
UPDATE so_lease
lease_code = #{leaseCode},
lease_status = #{leaseStatus},
lease_audit_status = #{leaseAuditStatus},
affirm_status = #{affirmStatus},
product_id = #{productId},
product_name = #{productName},
rental_price = #{rentalPrice},
deposit_price = #{depositPrice},
product_price = #{productPrice},
product_num = #{productNum},
code = #{code},
lease_start_time = #{leaseStartTime},
lease_end_time = #{leaseEndTime},
lease_remark_user = #{leaseRemarkUser},
lease_remark_c = #{leaseRemarkC},
lease_remark_c_user = #{leaseRemarkCUser},
link_phone = #{linkPhone},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
c_id = #{cId},
c_name = #{cName},
ask_time = #{askTime},
commit_user_id = #{commitUserId},
commit_user_name = #{commitUserName},
commit_time = #{commitTime},
audit_user_id = #{auditUserId},
audit_user_name = #{auditUserName},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
audit_reason = #{auditReason},
cancel_reason_user = #{cancelReasonUser},
cancel_reason_c = #{cancelReasonC},
order_code = #{orderCode},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
merchant_name = #{merchantName},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
